features: HEALS AND REVITALIZES DRY SKIN: Absorbs fast into extra dry skin, including dried out, flaky hands or typical rough spots, like heels, elbows, and knees
EXTRA DRY SKIN LOTION: Jergens Ultra Healing Moisturizer helps to improve skin's appearance and texture while providing relief for dry and rough skin
HELPS TO REPAIR DRY SKIN: Penetrates five layers of skin and reduces dryness at the source to nourish and heal dry skin
VISIBLY HEALTHIER SKIN: With continual use of Jergens Ultra Healing Dry Skin Moisturizer, skin is nourished and looks visibly healthier over time
FORMULATED WITH QUALITY INGREDIENTS: A unique formulation, with a Hydralucence blend of ingredients combined with Vitamins C, E, and B, to leave skin luminous
Sustainability Claims: Not Tested on Animals
body.description: Product Description Leave one lotion in each room to make sure the whole household is covered or take one with you on the go. Repair dryness at the source with Jergens Ultra Healing Moisturizer for Extra Dry Skin. The nourishing formula penetrates through five layers of skin to heal extra dry skin, improve tone and texture, and leave it smooth and visibly healthier. The formula absorbs to soften areas that tend to need the most moisture like heels, elbows, and knees. This body moisturizer, with a unique Hydralucence blend of ingredients plus Vitamins C, E, and B5, leaves your skin luminous and moisturized for up to 48 hours. Jergens travel sized hand lotion makes for the perfect on-the-go cracked hands relief. Jergens hand and body lotion for women and men is carefully formulated for optimal dry skin relief. This Kao USA body cream for women and men soothes skin for long lasting hydration. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply. From the Manufacturer Jergens Ultra Healing Lotion, Trial Travel, 1 Fluid Ounce.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Jergens moisturizing lotion provides effective, dermatologist-recommended long-lasting dry skin relief. Formulated with revitalizing, moisture-rich ingredients for dewy radiance, our Ultra Healing and Original Scent lotions heal and soothe extra dry skin. Whether you prefer glow-boosting lotion with a cherry-almond scent or replenishing body balm for smooth skin, you can't go wrong adding one of these moisturizing formulas to your daily skin care routine! Soothing ingredients like plant proteins, natural vitamins, and our unique hydralucence blend work together to create luminous, healthy skin.— Radiance-enhancing ingredients that absorb quickly — Dermatologist-tested to nourish and heal dry skin — Soften and smooth for visibly beautiful, healthy skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purse (pocket) size
reviews.reviewText: These were ordered to go in gift bags to a crew of workers, men and women. There were no issues, the size is perfect for pockets or purses, it's a unisex gift and came in an arrangement of 24. Great deal! Easy addition to other gifts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for travel
reviews.reviewText: Love this smell! Great daily moisturizer! Would be great for travel or blessing/donation bags.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as Described
reviews.reviewText: A great product for community outreach. The size makes it convenient for all to have whether it be for homeless outreach or just as a giveaway. The lotion itself is great, not a heavy fragrance and very moisturizing.The price for this is amazing, will start purchasing more frequently!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered 4 sets of 24 and I received all 96 of them! I was nervous I would be shorted a few based on the other reviews but I wasn’t! None came broken and they are all full and in great condition! Couldn’t be more pleased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was the best deal on the internet! I sent them to a charity that makes up care pkgs for military service members. Prob good that the scent is very mild.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gift for employees
reviews.reviewText: We handed these out to our employees for Christmas and they loved them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars jergens ultra healing lotion
reviews.reviewText: the gift size was exactly the right size for purse or jacket pocket for men. Would like to see the dove hand cream sold in 1oz size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the size an a good price
reviews.reviewText: Love the size n was a good size to put n my thank you bag for my bday, good some for yr money
